name: Dimension traveller
description:
A - D: to move

Space: to jump

Shift+horizontal movement key: to dash

Shift: to dash

You are a dimension traveller. You travel through them by going through mysterious doors. 

This game was made for the: My first game jam: summer 2020. game jam

There is a secret ending hidden in one of the levels. Can you find it?

Still dont know how to do audio design though.
